title: Torus Automorphisms & Texture Mapping
text:
Some examples of torus automorphisms, and their applications to texture mapping. These were made using python and open3D.



screenshot of open3D rendering



identity
cat map
bike gang
periodic

title: Torus after the First Iteration
text:
This image from the open3D docs is mapped onto a torus.



 

A periodic map applied to the image above gives this.



first periodic iteration





(Resolution: 256x256)



<model-viewer 
    src="../assets/uv_checkerboard_res_1024_iter_1_period_3_map.glb" 
    alt="A 3D textured torus" 
    auto-rotate 
    camera-controls 
    ar 
    shadow-intensity="1" 
    exposure="1" 
    environment-image="neutral">
</model-viewer>



Torus after the Second Iteration


(Resolution: 256x256)



<model-viewer 
    src="../assets/uv_checkerboard_res_1024_iter_2_period_3_map.glb" 
    alt="A 3D textured torus" 
    auto-rotate 
    camera-controls 
    ar 
    shadow-intensity="1" 
    exposure="1" 
    environment-image="neutral">
</model-viewer>

(Resolution: 256x256)
